'''Malko''' is a character in the [[Season 5|fifth season]]. He will be played by [[Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje]].<ref>[http://www.ign.com/articles/2014/10/17/losts-adewale-akinnuoye-agbaje-joins-game-of-thrones]</ref>

According to reports, he is a slave-auctioner in [[Meereen]].<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/new-details-adewale-akinnuoye-agbajes-game-thrones-role/ SPOILERS New details on Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbajeâ€™s Game of Thrones role]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no character by the name of "Malko", and it has been confirmed that this is a character invented for the television series. It is unknown whether Malko will be a completely new creation or if he will replace the role of one or many existing characters from the books, similar to [[Talisa Maegyr]] fulfilling the role of [[Talisa Maegyr#In_the_books|Jeyne Westerling]] and [[Locke]] of [[Locke#In the_books|Vargo Hoat]].
